actions-list.actionItem: The Speaker announced that the House do now adjourn pursuant to section 3(z) of H. Res. 5. The next meeting is scheduled for 11:00 a.m. on August 16, 2024.

Pursuant to section 4 of the United States Semiquincentennial Commission Act of 2016 (Public Law 114-196), and the order of the House of January 9, 2023, the Speaker appointed Mr. James W. Rane of Abbeville, Alabama.
The Chair led the House in reciting the Pledge of Allegiance to the Flag.
Pursuant to section 3(z) of H. Res. 5, the Journal of the last day's proceedings was approved.
Today's prayer was offered by the House Chaplain, Chaplain Margaret Grun Kibben.
The Speaker designated the Honorable Larry Bucshon to act as Speaker pro tempore for today.
The House convened, starting a new legislative day.
